snippet: President Obama signed a bill that gave railroads at least three more years to install safety technology known as positive train control.
abstract: Pres Obama signs bill giving railroads until end of 2018 to install so-called positive train control safety technology.
lead_paragraph: President Obama signed a bill that gave railroads at least three more years to install safety technology known as positive train control.

headline.print_headline: Obama Signs Bill Delaying Deadline for Train-Safety Equipment Installation
headline.main: Obama Signs Bill Delaying Deadline for Train-Safety Equipment Installation
